title: sAyujya padam tA
sahitya:
sAyujya padam tA sAminAthA unnai sharaNam aDaindEnE
			(madhyamakAla)
sakalam aruL vinagaL agala aruL surandu kamala 


anupallavi

  mAyum poi vAzhvil manam paTriDEnE mati aNi shivan pudalvA
			(madhyamakAla)
gatiyum aLittaruLa vidhiyum koDuttuNarndu kamala


caraNam    ajnAna vErilai aruttaruL puribavanE aruTkurvAi amarnda aruT sharavaNabhavanE
mei jnAna mUrtiyE miguttaruNai jyOtiyE veTrivEl uDaiyavanE
			(madhyamakAla)
viDiyum koDum pagaiyum kaDindu para sukham amara
